description: Detects the creation of a schtask that potentially executes a base64 encoded payload stored in the Windows Registry using PowerShell.
author: pH-T (Nextron Systems)
@Kostastsale
@TheDFIRReport
X__Junior (Nextron Systems)
Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
name: Scheduled Task Executing Encoded Payload from Registry
query: (((process.executable.text:"*\\schtasks.exe") OR (winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:"schtasks.exe")) AND process.command_line.text:"*\/Create*" AND process.command_line.text:("*FromBase64String*" OR "*encodedcommand*") AND process.command_line.text:("*Get\-ItemProperty*" OR "*\ gp\ *") AND process.command_line.text:("*HKCU\:*" OR "*HKLM\:*" OR "*registry\:\:*" OR "*HKEY_*"))
